data.text: Ezela nui Etan ná-kidafaawui.
Nà Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-nuɓɔɠɔlai maawuyezu,
Nà zoo gè bo, gè ɠɛ ma:
È boni, è ɠɛ ma: «Gè minazeɠegi woni nà-nui ʋɛ, gè yiimazeɠeai la,
‹Nà yɛ è-mavofodai zeizu masadai zu eyɛsu ɠɔ, ɗa zeɠena ná,
Geeɠɔlɔgiti su aniiti kpein ta ɗa-ɠɛɛwoti maayikiaiti dɛbizu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Ɓɛ ɠa é ga è ɠɛʋele, geeɠɔlɔgi zu, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI?
GALA maayikiʋɛ gola, nu ɲadegaiti ta-maaɓɔgi zu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii!
Ungo, ɗa ɠila kpe ka ɗa ɗa kpoloɗɛi ná-wasogi ɠaayei.
Ɗa ɠa è ziɛ wu zua ɲɔi Laɠaɓe89:11 zua ɲɔi Laɠaɓe: Tanisu daaseigi naa ɠa ɓɔɛzu é ʋilɛ Ezipete ʋa ɓaa kpoloɗɛi. lɛɛvɛni, é za,
Geeɠɔlɔgi ɠa ga ɗɔnɔ, zooi ɓalaagi ɠa ga ɗɔnɔ,
Ɗa ɠa è lɛkpɛmaʋɛti kpɛtɛa, nu ɠɔʋɛzu ʋelei, ta nu yeezazu ʋelei,
È-yeei maaɠiliʋɛ ga zɛbɛi,
Ɗa-masa kpɔkpɔgi ma wuulaagi ɠa ga telebodai ta sɔledai.
Ee, undaanɛ nuɓusɛ ɠa ga naati, niiti ti zoogai è maamusɛzu!
Ta ɠoozunɛ yeenɔpɛ, tɔɔzei ɗa ga ta-ƓALAGI.
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ɠa è ti-zɛbɛi ɠulazu kɛlɛma, é volo,
Gi makɛ nui ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yeezu,
Mɔungi, è ɓɔɛni kulakɛlɛmai zu, è ɠɛ ɗa-wooɠɛɠila nuiti ma:
gè Davide ɠaani, gè ɠɛ é ɠɛ ga nà-botiɠɛ nui,
Nà yeeyɛ ba,
Sili nuiti ti la ɠula filiba eyɛsu pɛ,
Nà sili nuiti kpein dɛɛvɛ tuɠɔ,
Nà-wooɠɛɠiladai ta nà-nuɓɔɠɔlaiti ta ɠɛ tɔun ba,
Nà kpoloɗɛi lɔ zeezu, é zei unda,
Toɠa wooɠula mà, é ɠɛ mà:
Nɔ̀un nà, nà tɔun kɛ ga dòun zunu mɔungi,
Nà nà-wooɠɛɠiladai makɛ bɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Nà mavofodai makɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ,
«Ni tanisu mavofodaiti ta ɠɛlɛna nà-tɔgi ʋa,
ti nà-deveiti koloɠolo,
nà tukpɔi zeɠe, gè ta-lɔ koloɠologi maaɠolo,
Kɛlɛ gè la ɓega nà-nuɓɔɠɔlai ʋa tɔun bɛ.
Gè la nà-minazeɠegi ɠoloɠologa,
Gè ɠonani, ná ɠɛ ɠila nà-ɲadedai ma,
Mavofodai ɠa yɛ ná ɠɔ,
toɠa zei eyɛsu ɠɔ eɠɛ alugi,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, è masagi yɛni na, è ɠɛlɛ ba,
È ɗa-minazeɠegi ɠoloɠologa, nii è seɠeni ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui ʋɛ,
È zeɠei wɔa ná-siɠigiti kpein ba,
Teʋe nuiti kpein ti loa su,
È sili nuiti iɲɔdɔɔni,
È ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi zeɠeni pelei ʋa, pilisuʋɛ,
Ʋelei é ɠɛa volozu la, è naa ɠaaʋa,
È ná-nu niinɛlai ma voloiti suɓuɠaa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa yɛsu dɔɔɠui zu, eyɛsu yeelɛ,
Ɠizɛ su ga nà-eteai zu la ɠoozani,
Nui ɓɛgele ɠa a zoo é zɛnvui wo, é la saai ɠaa?
Maliɠii, mini ɠa ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai ná, è ti ɠɛɛni mɔungi zu?
Maliɠii, ɠizɛ ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti ta-unfegi zu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɠizɛ su ga è zili nuiti ta ɓaaɠulamai ɠɛɛzu,
Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ!
